mapper.select: SELECT id, name, description, avatar, version, function_type, state, creator_type, creator, updater_type, released_time, created_time, updated_time FROM agent_template WHERE id = #{id} AND state = 0

SELECT id, name, description, avatar, version, function_type, state, creator_type, creator, updater_type, released_time, created_time, updated_time FROM agent_template WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND state = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agent_template (id, name, description, avatar, version, function_type, state, creator_type, creator, updater_type, updater, released_time, created_time, updated_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{avatar}, #{version}, #{functionType}, #{state}, #{creatorType}, #{creator}, #{updaterType}, #{updater}, #{releasedTime}, NOW(), NOW())
